Soft and unmistakable, the banana is a popular fruit for its great taste and versatility.
An excellent source of vitamin A and dietary fiber, carrots are mostly served as a side dish when they could be the star of the show.
For a sweet and tangy touch in your soups, consider adding apples to your recipes.
Grapes are a good source of potassium and contain vitamin C, thiamine and vitamin B6.
Peach is packed with vitamins, dietary fiber and antioxidants, but to get the full benefits, it is essential to consume them with the skin
With a relatively mushy texture, these seeds lend themselves to an infinite variety of preparations from starters, soups and main courses
Fresh and delicious bread to accompany your meals and snacks.
Corn is one of the most versatile ingredients that can be used in many recipes
This milk is a Quebec food that stands out thanks to its rich and creamy taste.
Butter, delicious and versatile, is an essential ingredient on every cook\'s grocery list. Butter really enhances the taste of dishes.
Yogurt, made from Canadian milk, is a true dairy delight.
You will discover tasty cheeses in all regions of Quebec. And it\'s all available at a grocery store near you!
We offer quality local meats, tasty fish and seafood and more.
This fish paste is a source of omega-3 polyunsaturated and protein. It is free of preservatives and no artificial flavours or colours.
Our lobsters all come from the Atlantic. Lobster meat is low in calories and is an excellent source of protein and omega-3s.
